operations.summary: getResources() - List resources available for user session management.
operations.notes: See listed operations for each resource available.

apis.description: Operations available for user session management.

operations.summary: getCustomSettings() - Retrieve all custom user settings.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
Denied Access - No permission.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Returns an object containing name-value pairs for custom user settings

operations.summary: setCustomSettings() - Set or update one or more custom user settings.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs of desired settings.

responseMessages.message: Bad Request - Request does not have a valid format, all required parameters, etc.
Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
Denied Access - No permission.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: A valid session is required to edit settings. Post body should be an array of name-value pairs.

apis.description: Operations for managing custom user settings.

operations.summary: getCustomSetting() - Retrieve one custom user setting.

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Name of the setting to retrieve.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
Denied Access - No permission.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Setting will be returned as an object containing name-value pair. A value of null is returned for settings that are not found.

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Name of the setting to delete.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
Denied Access - No permission.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: A valid session is required to delete settings.

apis.description: Operations for individual custom user settings.

operations.summary: getDevices() - Retrieve the current user's device information.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: A valid current session is required to use this API.

operations.summary: setDevice() - Create a record of the current user's device information.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs for the user device.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Record the device information for this session. This method is idempotent and will only create one entry per uuid.

apis.description: Operations on a user's device information.

operations.summary: changePassword() - Change or reset the current user's password.

parameters.name: reset
parameters.description: Set to true to perform password reset.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: Login and create a session upon successful password reset.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs for password change.

responseMessages.message: Bad Request - Request does not have a valid format, all required parameters, etc.
Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes:
A valid current session along with old and new password are required to change the password directly posting 'old_password' and 'new_password'.
To request password reset, post 'email' and set 'reset' to true.
To reset the password from an email confirmation, post 'email', 'code', and 'new_password'.
To reset the password from a security question, post 'email', 'security_answer', and 'new_password'.

operations.summary: getProfile() - Retrieve the current user's profile information.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: A valid current session is required to use this API. This profile, along with password, is the only things that the user can directly change.

operations.summary: updateProfile() - Update the current user's profile information.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs for the user profile.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Update the display name, phone, etc., as well as, security question and answer.

operations.summary: register() - Register a new user in the system.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: Login and create a session upon successful registration.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs for new user registration.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: The new user is created and, if required, sent an email for confirmation. This also handles the registration confirmation by posting email, confirmation code and new password.

apis.description: Operations to register a new user.

operations.summary: getSession() - Retrieve the current user session information.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized Access - No currently valid session available.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Calling this refreshes the current session, or returns an error for timed-out or invalid sessions.

operations.summary: login() - Login and create a new user session.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data containing name-value pairs used for logging into the system.

responseMessages.message: Bad Request - Request does not have a valid format, all required parameters, etc.
System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Calling this creates a new session and logs in the user.

operations.summary: logout() - Logout and destroy the current user session.

responseMessages.message: System Error - Specific reason is included in the error message.

operations.notes: Calling this deletes the current session and logs out the user.

resource.description: Array of accessible components available by this service.
Array of resources available by this service.

success.description: True when API call was successful, false or error otherwise.

uuid.description: Unique ID generated by the device.
Unique ID generated by the device.

last_modified_date.description: Date this device was last modified.

ids.description: Array of system record identifiers, used for batch GET, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE.

old_password.description: Old password to validate change during a session.

email.description: User's email to be used with code to validate email confirmation.

code.description: Code required with new_password when using email confirmation.

security_question.description: User's security question, returned on reset request when no email confirmation required.

success.description: True if password updated or reset request granted via email confirmation.

email.description: Email address of the current user.

first_name.description: First name of the current user.

last_name.description: Last name of the current user.

display_name.description: Full display name of the current user.

security_question.description: Question to be answered to initiate password reset.

default_app_id.description: Id of the application to be launched at login.

email.description: Email address of the current user.

first_name.description: First name of the current user.

last_name.description: Last name of the current user.

display_name.description: Full display name of the current user.

security_question.description: Question to be answered to initiate password reset.

default_app_id.description: Id of the application to be launched at login.

email.description: Email address of the new user.

first_name.description: First name of the new user.

last_name.description: Last name of the new user.

display_name.description: Full display name of the new user.

code.description: Code required with new_password when using email confirmation.

email.description: Email address of the current user.

first_name.description: First name of the current user.

last_name.description: Last name of the current user.

display_name.description: Full display name of the current user.

is_sys_admin.description: Is the current user a system administrator.

role.description: Name of the role to which the current user is assigned.

last_login_date.description: Date timestamp of the last login for the current user.

app_groups.description: App groups and the containing apps.

no_group_apps.description: Apps that are not in any app groups.

session_id.description: Id for the current session, used in X-DreamFactory-Session-Token header for API requests.

ticket.description: Timed ticket that can be used to start a separate session.

ticket_expiry.description: Expiration time for the given ticket.

duration.description: Duration of the session, Defaults to 0, which means until browser is closed.

is_url_external.description: Does this application exist on a separate server.

launch_url.description: URL at which this app can be accessed.

requires_fullscreen.description: True if the application requires fullscreen to run.

allow_fullscreen_toggle.description: True allows the fullscreen toggle widget to be displayed.

toggle_location.description: Where the fullscreen toggle widget is to be displayed, defaults to top.

is_default.description: True if this app is set to launch by default at sign in.
